desc: We’re the creators of Flavor Wrapped™ Popcorn Kernels and we're on a mission to liberate you from boring popcorn. Welcome to the popcorn revolution.

layout.text: We’re on a mission to liberate you from boring popcorn. With unexpected flavors, new ways to pop, and a complete reinvention of your favorite snack, we make delicious popcorn optimized for eating.
